org.jclouds.virtualbox.domain

Class StorageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jclouds.virtualbox.domain.StorageController

  • public class StorageController
extends Object
    Represents a storage controller in a VirtualBox VM.

    name is the unique name of the controller. bus is the type of connection bus for the controller hardDisks contains the hard disks that are attached (or should be attached) to this controller isoImages contains the ISOs that are attached (or should be attached) to this controller

    See Also:
    StorageBus
